name: Driftwood sailboat
description:
This gentle collaboration between forest and lake, has provided driftwood to make the boat and mast....while the sail was felted using a soft winter white natural wool.   It's a very earthy piece, and satisfies any natural palette.  A lovely gift for sea lovers, or a peaceful addition to your holiday scenes!
It measures 9"X8".

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

name: Tree spirit
description:
This very big encaustic photo transfer, captures a mysterious and beautiful tree in winter, that towers over my home and neighborhood, standing strong as we go about out lives.  

For this piece, I began with a clear beeswax foundation,  on the 36"x24" birch panel.  I then burnished the ink from a photograph of the tree turned raw inkjet print, into the wax.  A long and laborious process, but so worth it when the wax finally held the image!  I added another layer of beeswax, to seal the ink forever.  It's a striking image on any wall.  If you LOVE trees, this piece will make a powerful statement in your space!


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

name: Cut your own trees
description:
A whimsical vintagey diorama for the wintery season!
This old crate turned art piece, incorporates my love of wood, encaustics and wool!  Hang it on your wall or rest it on a shelf or mantle, it will add a little vintage to your modern holiday!  

The crate measures 13.25" x 10" with a depth of 6.75". The felted trees are made using 100% wool and a clear beeswax, and are permanently affixed to the crate.  


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Core light
description:
A large striking raw beauty that's both messy and calming at the same time.  The circle of light SPILLING out from the centre, has a peaceful effect, and brings everything back to centre in a room.  This piece really gets to you, the longer you are with it... In a feel good kind of way!   

An encaustic painting, 24" x 24" on new birch panel.



Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.  I will allow you to arrange shipping if you would prefer...

name: Woodland wanderers
description:
It was believed that deer were associated with the fairie realm, in ancient celtic animal lore, and would lead troops of fairies.  Hundreds of them... trailing behind as the stag cut a path through the forest.  

This raw and magical diorama measures 14" high x 7.25 wide" and 4.5" deep. The very old crate that contains it all, is a beautiful piece on it's own.  I have sealed the imagery (provided by a dear friend) with clear beeswax, and made the whimsical trees by hand, using wool and beeswax.  It's a gem of a piece for winter....

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: encaustic ornaments
description:
These small wooden disks have been slowly dried and turned into miniature encaustic paintings, to hang on your tree at Christmas.  
No two are alike!  

THIS IS FOR A SET OF THREE, and may be all I have left for the season!
If I make it to the woods, there is a chance for another batch, but likely not!

All local purchases (Kingston Ontario) will be delivered for free!  Ho ho ho

name: Luminaries
description:
A winter light installation, of the woolly kind.

We all could use a little extra light ....

A beautiful addition to your winter solstice, holiday celebrations, window displays, or any corners of the world that would LOVE a little FESTIVAL OF LIGHTS.  These lanterns cast wonderful glow after dark, but are so ambient when lit by day.  They are quite lovely!

These felted forms vary in sizes, up to 12" inches high, and up to 6" wide.  There are six shapes, each has windows in varying positions.  No two are alike.  They sit atop a beautiful slab of barn board, but are not affixed, making it easy to move them about until you get them just the way you like them.  They are light yet sturdy, handmade using 100% wool, and are intended to be lit from within, using candles.


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

name: Claurice
description:
A wintery encaustic painting of a graceful doe reaching for red berries, in a quiet snowfall.  It's woodland, and wintery.  Deer are symbolically associated with peace, beauty and infinite generosity...something we all could use a little more of in the darker winter months.  

Claurice is a very BIG piece, in size and spirit.  She measures 40" x 20 " on a new birch panel.  She  will be a symbolic calling for peace and lightness, throughout the winter months!  

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Mushrooms on driftwood
description:
Two mushrooms...an encaustic painting on a washed up piece of wood! This swell piece of driftwood in all it's grey glory, made the perfect canvas for an earthy collaboration! This tidy encaustic measures 10"x6.5", and would fit into any tight little spot, looking for a piece of art!


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Mr. Blue
description:
This sweet dark in color (not in mood!) encaustic painting embodies all the beauty of beeswax painting, with the textures, etchings, and swirling colors.  His soulful gaze tucked into the darkness of this piece deepens the beauty...  Mr. Blue is a piece for all deep sea lovers!
Measures 16" x 12 "on new birch panel.

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

name: Community
description:
This encaustic painting is done on a beautiful old board, measuring 44"  X  9.5".  The woodsy beauty of this piece is found in the wood, the colors and community theme...it's a special piece. With mushroom huts, warm characters and a banner with letters etched into the wax, spelling 'community, it's an easy painting to love!   If you could only smell the beeswax...


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Handmade wool and glass balls
description:
Set of four glass balls, felted with a warm deep brown and winter white wool, with silver tops.  These would be beautiful on any tree...but would also look beautiful in a wintery garland, for a handmade earthy Christmas!
Each ball is unique in it's design.

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase,  per piece.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Print of original encaustic painting 'Rudy'
description:
Oh Rudy! This sweet soulful reindeer print was born from so many requests for the original Christmas encaustic painting.  Sorry folks, he's family!

This is for one 8X10 print of Rudy... professionally printed on gorgeous heavy archival fine art paper.  Frame not included.

Great care will be taken to ensure he gets to you in tip top shape!

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Wirey woolly trees
description:
These naturally rustic winter white wool trees, are handmade using 100% wool, attached to a hand carved stick using natural beeswax.  They will make a lovely addition to your woodland Christmas scenes! They are made as ordered, so each one will be unique!  This is for ONE tree...

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase. 

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Handmade chocolate wool bag
description:
This is a medium weight handmade 100% wool bag, with a hand cut chocolate leather strap.  The interior is open and without pockets or compartments, and is a wintery white color with dark chocolate poking through.  It can be worn over the shoulder, but sits beautifully on the hip when worn across the chest.  The straps are removable, for hand washing.



Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Handmade Dark grey felt bag
description:
This handmade 100% wool bag is a dark whispy grey on the outside, with a hand cut soft black leather strap.  The interior is open without compartments or pockets, and is salt and pepper grey in color.  This bag can be worn on the shoulder, but sits beautifully on the hip when worn across the chest.  Strap can be removed to hand wash the bag.  

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Handmade grey felt bag
description:
A gorgeous light-weight 100% wool bag, handmade.  Hand cut black leather straps (another artist does this!) make this bag both rugged and earthy!  This bag can be worn on the shoulder, or across the chest.  


Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: On target
description:
A quirky and simple,  yet striking piece... an encaustic on salvaged trim, measuring 5" x 14".  Just the right size to tuck in tight spaces or neat little wall spots.  I used a clear beeswax, allowing the many layers of chipping beauty, to show through.   I LOVE the side view, with the old layers of paint showing...and the thin green line of paint running along the bottom front.  Oh if it sounds like I like this piece...I do!

Some pieces are just not meant to stay with me, no matter how badly I would like them to.  This is one.  




Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Encaustic pyramid
description:
Unique encaustic painting on salvaged architectural piece, measuring 11X15, with a depth of 1.25".

The original cracked paint can be seen through the clear beeswax.  The design merges graphical with the old, the piece is smooth to the touch and striking from straight on, and from the side.  

Accurate and FAIR shipping fees will be calculated after purchase, on per painting basis.

All LOCAL (Kingston Ontario) purchases in December will be delivered for FREE!  ho ho ho

name: Honouring the bees
description:
I LOVE the bees and what they provide for our planet, and my art!
The dreamy mellow yellows in the background are like the honey they provide.  

This encaustic painting is a tribute to the tiny miracles and is on a 10 x 10 new panel.

name: Wall flowers
description:
Encaustic painting on barn beam, 6.5" X 12".....rustic with a pop of color! 
I have used a clear beeswax to cover the surface, allowing the wood element to come through.  The carvings are raw and jump off the wood, so to speak!
This painting sits deep on the wall, the side exposed wood is gorgeous!



Shipping costs for LOCAL Kingstonians are free in December.
For all other destinations, an accurate and FAIR shipping estimate for paintings will be given after sale.
